ModMetaData.name: Mashed's Bloodmoon
ModMetaData.author: SirMashedPotato
ModMetaData.description:
A completely remade version of the original Bloodmoon mod, made to a much higher standard, and with significantly more experience under my belt. Now with a fully featured lycanthropy system, allowing colonists to become lycanthropes, and gain powerful upgrades.

- Very much inspired by the Elder Scrolls series by Bethesda Studios, with a heavy focus on the Bloodmoon expansion for Morrowind
- Lycanthrope ability sounds otained from https://mixkit.co/
- Thanks to those that provided feedback: BongBong, Theo, Aludis, Aquiles, charybdis6404, Fabricator General, Roque the Rogue
- And to Ranger Rick for being neat
